pageProduct.name: Wellgrove Immune Support Olive Leaf Extract 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Wellgrove Immune Support olive leaf extract is a naturally-derived, preservative free alternative to support immune health and overall and health and wellbeing. Traditionally used in western herbal medicine to help support immune system health and help relieve symptoms of common colds and flu. It also provides antioxidants to reduce free radicals formed in the body.

Warnings

Please consult a healthcare professional before use if: diagnosed medical conditions; taking any other medications, pregnant or breastfeeding; under 6 years. Keep out of reach of children. Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. Use only as directed. If symptoms persist, see your health professional.

Common Uses

IMMUNE SUPPORT Traditionally used in herbal medicine (western) to help support immune system health, and help relieve symptoms of common colds and flu..
GENERAL HEALTH & WELLBEING Provides antioxidants to help reduce free radicals formed in the body Helps promote general health and wellbeing when used as part of a healthy lifestyle.

Ingredients

olefreshTM Olea europaea (Olive) leaf extract.

Directions

Adults (Children 12+ years & Adults): 2 capsules daily. Children 6 to 12 years (20kg-40kg): 1 capsule daily * Children's dose rates based on herbal dosing principles Best consumed with food. Storage Instructions: Store upright and below 30°c in a dry place, away from sunlight. Consume within 3 months of opening.
